comments.body:
It is more code, but the style guide says to prefer switch statements for enums:

https://github.com/flutter/flutter/wiki/Style-guide-for-Flutter-repo#avoid-using-if-chains-or--or--with-enum-values

The gallery has a custom dark-blue theme. Should the slider demo reflect that?

Would it be possible to configure this theme based on colors from the overall theme's color scheme?
- Sorry - my mistake! This is the custom slider theme; it's supposed to be different.
I think it correctly goes to a lighter blue for dark theme. Changed the custom track and tick colors to use colors from the color scheme

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +310,314 @@            mainAxisSize: MainAxisSize.min,
            children: <Widget>[
              SliderTheme(
                data: theme.sliderTheme.copyWith(
                  activeTrackColor: Colors.deepPurple,
